title: Mac Crashing problem when loading into game
body: Today on March 7 2017 after the little update league had, i cant loading into games. I have tried restarting my computer and doing a full repair on league and i still get bugsplat when i go into loading screen. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: That sounds frustrating, and running a repair was a solid first step!  Your issue may be caused by a driver problem, or settings on your Mac like having automatic graphic switching enabled.  For your specific issue, go over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot.  Make sure to use the Mac instructions specifically for your case!  I hope that helps!
Im having this problem as well. It started yesterday and I got 1 response from tech support but have not received a response in 24 hours
